attributes.title: I WAS SLAPPED BY THE LARGE ORANGE CHEETO
attributes.review: so one day i was walking through the suburbs of zimbabwe and a cheeto with human features hopped out of a sewer grate and slapped me i gotta mood was a good thing to me in my opinion and the only thing that was so wholesome and the service is great and they have the same thing haha

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app practically took my first born child to download. Secondly, in the terms and conditions of this app it asks you to sign away your rights as a US citizen!!! CRAZY. I got 480 messages in one day from this app alone. RIDICULOUS. Do NOT use this app. It is terrible.

attributes.title: Trump is awful
attributes.review: Not o my was the app itself slow when I opened it but look at all of trumps official statements he is a pig of a person and he is the only person I have ever felt like hating and makes me enraged!🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app took 500 hours to download and I just don’t understand why everything was in Chinese I thought we had a patriotic president and he has let me down.

attributes.title: Very bad app
attributes.review: This app was HORRIBLE! It took 5 days to download, and it was suppppperrrr glitchy! 10/10 would NOT RECOMMEND!!!!! Plus I’m pretty sure the app has a tracker in it. Which is very scary! This is what you get for trying to take away TikTok.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP‼️⚠️❗️❕
attributes.review: I downloaded this app two days ago. it sends numerous annoying notifications and the app is glitchy. On top of that, the minute I had downloaded it, my phone became possessed by an evil demon and threw me off a cliff. Now I don’t have legs.

attributes.title: Horrible HORRIBLE app
attributes.review: I was expecting really high hope to have this app for our AMAZING president but it was indeed BORING AND SAD!!!!! It took soooooo long to download (1-2 days... YES DAYS) and was very underwhelming. The president needs to step up his game otherwise I will NOT be voting for him this November.😡😡😡

attributes.title: Do Not Download!
attributes.review: This is such a horrible app! It took days to download and I’m pretty sure gave me a horrible virus. It also uses so much data and is so slow. This needs to be removed from the App Store!!! 🤢🤢

attributes.title: Installed a virus
attributes.review: This app is a scam!!!! Do not download it cause my phone to crash and when I was able to get it to work (by some miracle) I couldn’t even use the screen!!!! Had to get a new phone 😠DO NOT RECOMMEND

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!
attributes.review: This app took way too long to download! I went to the store and came back and still wasn’t downloaded! Then when I opened it my phone crashed! All I want to do is support my man but I cant with this app!
